decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The proposed two new windows in the east and windows in the west elevation of the single storey side and side/rear extension approved shall contain only obscure glass, and shall be permanently fixed shut.  A sample of the obscured glass, no smaller than 300 mm square shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority before any work is commenced on the relevant part of the development, and the development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the sample thus approved.  The details so approved shall be retained permanently.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties. | The garage accommodation shall not be used for living purposes.  REASON:	To ensure that adequate parking accommodation is retained within the site.
description: Erection of single storey extension to side and side/rear of bungalow and erection of new roof over existing property and new extension
